flavor: The beast rushed at them, wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…
info: Toggle the Resilience of a non-Gold unit on the battlefield. A Resilient unit stays on the battlefield for the next round.
name: Adrenaline Rush

flavor: Better to die standing than to live on bent knee.
info: Play immediately from your deck whenever there are 5 or more revealed Elf units on your side.
name: Aelirenn

flavor: The druid Vaedermakar controls the elements. He soothes storms into silence, musters destructive hail, summons lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat him with utmost respect.
info: Spawn a Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog or Torrential Rain card, then banish self.
name: Aeromancy

flavor: Brokilon bleeds… and not even I can heal it.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold Special Card from your graveyard.
name: Aglais

flavor: Pledge your allegiance to our Emperor, Emhyr var Emreis... or die.
info: Gain Weather Immunity.
name: Alba Pikeman

flavor: Death and glory!
info: Gain a Shield. Shields protect from one strength-removing effect (but not from strength-resetting or swapping effects).
name: Alba Spearmen

flavor: A ball of fire? Why, naturally. Whatsoever Your Imperial Majesty desires.
info: If your opponent has not passed, draw a card, then your opponent draws a card and reveals it.
name: Albrich

flavor: Two ounces of calcium equum, one ounce of rubedo...
info: Reveal a random card in your opponent’s hand.
name: Alchemist

flavor: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.
info: Add 3 strength to the strongest non-Gold unit in your deck and play it. Ties are resolved randomly.
name: Alzur’s Double Cross

flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.
info: Remove 7 strength from a non-Gold unit.
name: Alzur’s Thunder

flavor: A spy? No, that's saying far too much. I consider myself more of an observer.
info: Add 12 strength to a random non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Ambassador

flavor: Many primal fears lurk in the hearts of men. The fear of the mist is well–founded…
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Gain 1 strength at the start of your turn if on a row affected by Fog.
name: Ancient Foglet

flavor: Ugly – nature's way of saying "stay away."
info: Play all Arachasae from your deck.
name: Arachas

flavor: Like a cross between a crab, a spider… and a mountain.
info: Spawn an Arachas whenever a Devourer on your side absorbs strength.
name: Arachas Behemoth

flavor: It's a griffin, just more... griffiny.
info: Remove Weather from its row.
name: Archgriffin

flavor:
"How much is a human life worth?"
"That depends. Yours, for instance, I'd put at about a hundred orens."
info: Lock and destroy an opposing non-Gold unit. Locked units lose all tokens and have no ability until replayed or moved to a hand.
name: Assassination

flavor: Nilfgaardian mages do have a choice: servile submission, or the gallows.
info: Choose up to 2 cards in your opponent’s graveyard and randomly place them in your opponent’s deck. For each card chosen, lose 1 strength.
name: Assire Var Anahid

flavor: Letho's got a plan... what could go wrong?
info: Lock or unlock a non-Gold unit on the battlefield. Locked units lose all tokens and have no ability until replayed or moved to a hand.
name: Auckes

flavor: You humans have… unusual tastes.
info: Draw 2 cards. The opposing player draws 1 card.
name: Avallac’h

flavor: What crossbows want to be when they grow up.
info: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Ballista

flavor: Our mead smells rotten to ye, do it? Easy to fix – I'll break yer nose!
info: Add 1 strength to all your other non-Gold Dwarf units, wherever they are.
name: Barclay Els

flavor: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.
info: Swap the strength of the strongest and the weakest unit on the battlefield. Ties are resolved randomly.
name: Bekker’s Twisted Mirror

flavor: Now finish your soup, or a berserker'll come and swallow ye whole.
info: When moved to the graveyard, transform into a Bear.
name: Berserker Marauder

flavor: Skellige must have a strong king. No matter what it takes.
info: Draw 2 cards. Keep 1 and discard the rest.
name: Birna Bran

flavor: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.
info: Spawn a Frost effect on both Melee rows that decreases the strength of all non-immune units on or appearing there to 1. Units regain all strength removed by Frost when Frost is removed or they move out of it.
name: Biting Frost

flavor: I aim for the knees. Always.
info: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit. If the unit’s strength is higher than base, remove 6 strength instead.
name: Black Infantry Arbalest

flavor: The witcher moved with unnatural speed. Too fast for the human eye to register.
info: Spawn either an Immune Boost or Overdose effect.
name: Blizzard Potion

flavor: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.
info: Spawn a Botchling or a Lubberkin.
name: Bloody Baron

flavor: By the time we'd heard them, it was already too late…
info: Return a Bronze, non-Relentless unit on your side (other than a Blue Mountain Commando) to your hand and immediately play it again.
name: Blue Mountain Commando

flavor: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly though, I kill for her.
info: Add 2 strength to all your other Blue Stripes Commandos in your hand, deck or on your side of the battlefield.
name: Blue Stripes Commando

flavor: Blue Stripes and Scoia'tael are similar in one regard – hatred fuels both.
info: Add 4 strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Blue Stripes Scout

flavor: I'm near ready to puke from boredom.
info: Spawn a Spectral Whale on a random row on the opposing side.
name: Blueboy Lugos

flavor: Mona…? No… no. I'm Braenn. A daughter of Brokilon.
info: Remove an amount equal to this unit’s strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Braenn

flavor: That doddery dolt? Ye cannae even tell if he's alive or stuffed!
info: Look at all Silver cards in your deck. Play one and place the others back randomly in your deck.
name: Brouver Hoog

flavor: His eyes flashed under his winged helmet. Fire gleamed from his sword's blade.
info: If your opponent has not passed, enable your Leader for use and your opponent draws the top Bronze card in their deck and reveals it.
name: Cahir

flavor: Men require constant alluring. Mystique and refinement do the job quite well.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Draw a card. You may keep it, or put it at the bottom of your deck and draw another. When not Spying, lose 6 base strength.
name: Cantarella

flavor: A favorite son who chose a life of villainy.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Spawn a Frost effect and 2 Wild Hunt Hounds.
name: Caranthir

flavor: There are more things in heaven and earth than all the world's philosopher's have dreamt.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit from the opposing graveyard.
name: Caretaker

flavor: "Your Imperial Highness..." blurted out the seneschal, whose presence until now had been thoroughly ignored. "I beg your pardon, but Cahir... My son..."
info: Gain 6 strength whenever either player uses a Leader card but before its effects resolve.
name: Ceallach

flavor: Common harpies feed on carrion. Celaeno harpies... they feed on dreams.
info: Transform all non-Gold Harpy Eggs on your side into Harpies and add 2 to their strength. Gain 1 strength for each Harpy Egg this unit transformed.
name: Celaeno Harpy

flavor: They call me Sparrowhawk. Know why? Because I eat rats like you for breakfast.
info: When moved to graveyard, convert to Silver.
name: Cerys

flavor: He'll not reveal his name till he's defeated. He's a troll errant, see?
info: Gain 2 base strength at the start of your turn if it’s the sole revealed unit on the row.
name: Champion of Champions

flavor: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.
info: Ambush: When the round ends, return to the hand of the current owner if that player lost.
name: Ciaran

flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.
info: Return to your hand if you lose the round.
name: Ciri

flavor: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.
info: When moved to the graveyard, randomly place in your deck and gain 3 base strength.
name: Ciri: Dash

flavor: Our clan's bards will sing of my deeds long after you're dead and forgotten!
info: Lose 2 strength.
name: Clan An Craite Warrior

flavor: So ye can hit a movin' target at two hundred paces? Me, too. In a storm.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Remove 1 strength from 3 non-Gold units.
name: Clan Brokvar Archer

flavor: Better believe we can hunt. Thing is, not much game on Undvik…
info: Remove 3 strength from a non-Gold unit.
name: Clan Brokvar Hunter

flavor: Can see the fear in their eyes. Fear o' me… fear o' Clan Dimun!
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Discard all Clan Dimun Pirates from your deck.
name: Clan Dimun Pirate

flavor: Haul together, hoist the colors high!
info: While in your hand, deck or on the battlefield, gain 1 strength whenever you discard a unit.
name: Clan Dimun Pirate Captain

flavor: They'll shatter on our shields like waves on a craggy shore.
info: Whenever this unit is weakened but not destroyed, play an instance of it from your deck.
name: Clan Drummond Shieldmaiden

flavor: The deeds of Clan Heymaey will go down in history.
info: Add 3 strength to adjacent non-Gold units.
name: Clan Heymaey Skald

flavor: Ye're in for a poundin'.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Reset all (if weakened) and weakened non-Gold units within 4 spaces to the left to base strength.
name: Clan Tordarroch Armorsmith

flavor: Remember me words – a good shield can save yer life.
info: Add 2 base strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Clan Tordarroch Shieldsmith

flavor: Swords are for wenches. Get yourself an axe.
info: Gain 1 strength whenever an opposing unit is weakened.
name: Clan Tuirseach Axeman

flavor: Friends we show heart, foes we show our axe. Remember that.
info: When resurrected, gain 3 base strength.
name: Clan Tuirseach Skirmishers

flavor: We are an Craite! What others buy with gold, we buy with our lifeblood.
info: Resurrect when discarded.
name: Clan an Craite Raider

flavor: Everyone wantin' to trade in Novigrad's got a clear choice - agree terms with Cleaver or kiss their knees farewell.
info: Lock or unlock a non-Gold unit on the battlefield. Locked units lose all tokens and have no ability until replayed or moved to a hand.
name: Cleaver

flavor: Want irrefutable proof of civilization's advance? Look at war. Man gets better at killing with each one.
info: Toggle the Resilience of a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield. A Resilient unit stays on the battlefield for the next round.
name: Combat Engineer

flavor: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.
info: Choose 5 adjacent units. Add 4 strength to non-Gold units among them.
name: Commander’s Horn

flavor: Her true name's Astrid Lyttneyd Asgeirrfinnbjornsdottir, but that never fit on any forms.
info: Spawn the appropriate Weather effect on the opposite row only.
name: Coral

flavor: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!
info: Spawn 2 Clan an Craite Warriors.
name: Crach An Craite

flavor: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you will make.
info: Play all Crone units from your deck.
name: Crone: Brewess

flavor: I sense your pain. I see your fear.
info: Play all Crone units from your deck.
name: Crone: Weavess

flavor: I'd be your best – and last.
info: Play all Crone units from your deck.
name: Crone: Whispess

flavor: Cynthia's talents can be deadly. She needs a tight leash.
info: if your opponent has not passed, draw a card, then create The Guardian in your opponent’s hand and reveal it.
name: Cynthia

flavor: One of four bosses who control the city's underworld - the others being Sigi Reuven, Carlo 'The Cleaver' Varese and the King of Beggars.
info: Remove 3 base strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Cyprian Wiley

flavor: Learned a lot at Braibant Military Academy, How to scrub potatoes, for instance.
info: No ability.
name: Daerlan Foot Soldiers

flavor: That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.
info: Spawn a Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog Torrential Rain or First Light card.
name: Dagon

flavor: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a liar – and my best friend.
info: Add 2 strength to each non-Gold unit played on your side. Does not affect spawned units.
name: Dandelion

flavor: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.
info: Return a non-Gold, non-Relentless unit on your side to your hand, add 3 to its base strength and immediately play it again, then banish self.
name: Decoy

flavor: I know how to execute orders, so take your advice somewhere else.
info: At the end of each turn, reset all other non-Gold units on the row to base strength.
name: Dennis Cranmer

flavor: I once made a prisoner vomit his own entrails... Ah, good times...
info: Banish a non-Gold card in the opposing graveyard.
name: Dethmold

flavor: Really believe you can dupe me with that tale you just pulled from your arse?
info: Look at all Gold cards in your deck. Play one and place the others back randomly in your deck.
name: Dijkstra

flavor: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.
info: Choose 5 adjacent units. Reset them to base strength. Convert affected Gold units to Silver (or Bronze, if that was their original color).
name: Dimeritium Bomb

flavor: The mage's arms were twisted and bound behind his back. The Redanians gave the fetters a good shake. Terranova cried out, lurched, bent backwards, bowed forward, then retched and groaned. It was clear of what his manacles were made.
info: Lock or unlock any unit on the battlefield. If Gold, convert it to Silver (or Bronze, if that was its original color). Locked units lose all tokens and have no ability until replayed or moved to a hand.
name: Dimeritium Shackles

flavor: When a warrant says "dead or alive," most bounty hunters'll just kill you. Not me. Should I catch you, you'll hang, and I'll tickle your feet as you expire.
info: Discard a non-Gold unit from your deck, then shuffle your deck.
name: Djenge Frett

flavor: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.
info: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Dol Blathanna Archer

flavor: You might manage to hide from them, but once spotted, don't bother trying to run.
info: Remove 5 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit with strength of 10 or more.
name: Dol Blathanna Marksman

flavor: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like heartless demons.
info: Ambush: When a revealed non-Gold unit appears on the row, remove 5 strength from adjacent non-Gold units.
name: Dol Blathanna Trapper

flavor: I've gathered all the jarls together. Now make your case.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Draw a card. You may keep it, or discard it and draw another.
name: Donar an Hindar

flavor: Hear ye now the tale of the heroic deeds of Clan an Craite.
info: Add 3 base strength to 2 non-Gold units in your graveyard.
name: Draig Bon–Dhu

flavor: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting from beyond the grave.
info: Remove 1 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit 7 times.
name: Draug

flavor: Though the witchman lusts for gold, for the smiting of a drowner thou shalt give him but a silver penny, or three halfpence, at most.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Move an opposing non-Gold unit to that side’s Siege row.
name: Drowner

flavor: A mimic, among the many other name for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings... or dopplers.
info: Set strength to that of an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Dudu

flavor: Always wondered – how the blazes do those lads handle nature's call…?
info: After 3 turns, convert to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
name: Dun Banner Heavy Cavalry

flavor: Stay calm, everyone. And be alert. The true owners of those cloaks and beaver-skin caps might be elsewhere.
info: Gain Weather Immunity.
name: Dun Banner Light Cavalry

flavor: The key's mixin' pleasure an' business – like smackin' foes and gettin' coin for it.
info: Gain 2 strength for each Dwarf unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Dwarven Mercenary

flavor: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.
info: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit. If it is not destroyed, gain 2 strength.
name: Dwarven Skirmisher

flavor: How do you fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.
info: When removed from the battlefield, spawn 3 Lesser Earth Elementals on the row where this unit was.
name: Earth Elemental

flavor: The dryad queen has eyes of molten silver, and a heart of cold–forged steel.
info: Return a non-Relentless unit on your side to your hand and immediately play it again.
name: Eithné

flavor: Who would think that overgrown bats would have a taste for gaudy jewelry?
info: Destroy a non-Gold unit on your side and absorb its strength.
name: Ekimmara

flavor: Love justifies madness in any of its forms.
info: While in your hand, deck or on the battlefield, gain 2 strength whenever a Commando Neophyte appears on your side.
name: Ele’yas

flavor: I spit on Scoia'tael ideals, but not on their coin.
info: Play a random non-Gold Special Card from your deck.
name: Elven Mercenary

flavor: You mean to say the she–elf danced amidst the fray? Have you lost your mind, corporal?!
info: Gain 4 strength whenever you play an Ambush.
name: Elven Wardancer

flavor: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless.
info: Reveal 3 random cards in the opposing hand.
name: Emhyr Var Emreis

flavor: But... but there's no justice in it! One does not kill the messenger!
info: Look at the top 2 Bronze units in your deck. Play one and place the other back randomly in your deck.
name: Emissary

flavor: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.
info: Destroy the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.
name: Epidemic

flavor: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.
info: Play Eredin.
name: Eredin

flavor: Only the ignorant dismiss the importance of myths.
info: Draw 2 cards, then discard 2 cards.
name: Ermion

flavor: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…
info: Play Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
name: Eskel

flavor: "Here she comes," he thought, "our imperial interest. A mock-princess, a mock-queen for Cintra. A mock-ruler for the mouth of the Yarra, future lifeblood of the empire."
info: Gain 1 strength at the start of each turn while Spying. If Spying when its owner passes, move to the opposing side.
name: Fake Ciri

flavor: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.
info: Resurrect a random Bronze non-Permadeath unit.
name: Field Medic

flavor: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.
info: No ability.
name: Fiend

flavor: Can't stand the heat? Then you don't stand a chance.
info: Spawn a Lesser Fire Elemental on this unit’s row at the start of your turn.
name: Fire Elemental

flavor: Not the best for taking cities, but great for razing them to the ground.
info: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Fire Scorpion

flavor: Careful…! One more step and you'll be turned into molten glass.
info: Ambush: When a revealed non-Gold unit appears on the opposite side, remove 3 strength from it and spawn a Commando Neophyte on a random row.
name: Fireball Trap

flavor: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…
info: Spawn either a Clear Skies or a Rally effect. Banish when moved to the graveyard.
name: First Light

flavor: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Play from your deck or graveyard whenever Fog is spawned. Destroy when moved outside of Fog or Fog is removed.
name: Foglet

flavor: Don't need advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades.
info: Choose a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield. Spawn an exact copy on the same row.
name: Foltest

flavor: To live in peace, we first must kill. This is human oppression's cruel finale.
info: Redraw up to 3 cards.
name: Francesca

flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.
info: Every 2 turns, banish a random non-Gold Special Card in your graveyard, then absorb 3 strength.
name: Frightener

info: No ability.
name: Fringilla Vigo

flavor: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.
info: Spawn 3 Shadows.
name: Gaunter O’Dimm

flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.
info: No ability.
name: Geralt

flavor: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.
info: Choose 3 adjacent units on the opposing Melee or Ranged row. Move all non-Gold units among them one row back, then remove 1 strength from all moved units.
name: Geralt: Aard

flavor: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.
info: Destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) on the opposite row if that row totals 20 or more strength.
name: Geralt: Igni

flavor: Paintings should convey emotion, not words.
info: Add 2 strength to all non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
name: Ge’els

flavor: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life… then it's one vicious circle.
info: Banish a random non-Gold unit in either graveyard and absorb its strength.
name: Ghoul

flavor: Big, bad, ugly. Squats in the sewers.
info: Discard a non-Gold unit, absorb its strength, then draw a card.
name: Giant Toad

flavor: Does not drink. Does not eat. Does walk, however. And fight.
info: When removed from the battlefield, spawn 2 Lesser Golems on the row where this unit was.
name: Golem

flavor: Their long tongues're for slurping marrow – and whipping prey.
info: After 1 turn, banish all non-Gold units in your graveyard and absorb 1 strength for each.
name: Grave Hag

flavor: An archdruid, a master of alchemy, and the grumpiest old fart in the Isles.
info: Remove 1 strength from 3 non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield. Gain 3 strength for each.
name: Gremist

flavor: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.
info: Move a non-Gold card from your opponent’s graveyard to your own.
name: Griffin

flavor: No one knows how he got his nickname – no one's dared to ask.
info: Remove 2 strength from all opposing non-Gold units.
name: Harald the Cripple

flavor: There are many species of harpy, and all are kleptomaniacs.
info: Spawn 2 Harpy Eggs on random rows on your side.
name: Harpy

flavor: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you though.
info: Add 3 strength to adjacent non-Gold units.
name: Hawker Healer

flavor: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.
info: Gain 1 strength whenever a revealed non-Gold unit appears on the opposing side.
name: Hawker Smuggler

flavor: Elf, dwarf, makes no difference – long as they've got coin.
info: Gain 2 strength whenever you play a Special Card.
name: Hawker Support

flavor: King Henselt did not look like a thief, but, with all due respect, that's really what he was.
info: Choose 7 adjacent units on your side. Convert all non-Gold units among them to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
name: Henselt

flavor: Instead of mournin' the fallen, let's drink to their memory!
info: Spawn a Lord of Undvik on the opposing side.
name: Hjalmar

flavor: Now let's drink to Emperor of Nilfgaard – may he die of somethin' hideous!
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Remove 2 strength from 3 non-Gold units.
name: Holger Blackhand

flavor: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Gain 5 strength when played on a row with Frost and each time a Frost effect is spawned on this unit’s row.
name: Ice Giant

flavor: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.
info: Ambush: When the next opposing non-Gold Special Card is played, cancel its effects.
name: Ida Emean

flavor: Ladd nahw! Kill them! Litter the earth with their entrails!
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Choose any opposing unit. Remove 3 strength from it (if non-Gold) and 1 strength from non-Gold units adjacent to it.
name: Imlerith

flavor: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.
info: Spawn a Fog effect on both Ranged rows that decreases the strength of all non-immune units on or appearing there to 1. Units regain all strength removed by Fog when Fog is removed or they move out of it.
name: Impenetrable Fog

info: Gain 2 strength for each Spying unit on the opposing side and whenever a Spying unit appears on the opposing side.
name: Impera Brigade

info: Gain 4 strength whenever either player uses a Leader card but before its effects resolve.
name: Impera Enforcers

flavor: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.
info: Remove 6 strength from a non-Gold unit on the battlefield.
name: Iorveth

info: When destroyed, add 3 strength to all opposing non-Gold units.
name: Iris

flavor: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.
info: Spawn 1 Commando Neophyte on a random row whenever you play a Special Card.
name: Isengrim

flavor: Famed for constantly prophesying the world's doom. Not much fun at parties.
info: Choose 3 adjacent units. Lock or unlock non-Gold units among them. Locked units lose all tokens and have no ability until replayed or moved to a hand.
name: Ithlinne

flavor: To describe the manner in which Duke de Wett led the Verden Group as "incompetent" would be far too kind.
info: Play the top loyal-only non-Gold unit in your deck and add 8 to its strength.
name: Joachim De Wett

flavor: A sword is but one of many tools at a ruler's disposal.
info: Move all Spying non-Gold units to your side of the battlefield.
name: John Calveit

flavor: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.
info: Add 3 strength to a non-Gold unit on your side, then 2 to a non-Gold unit on your side, then 1 to a non-Gold unit on your side.
name: John Natalis

flavor: Life without savoring the sound of "surreptitious shananacking" is like licking snails through a cloth.
info: Banish a card in your hand and create in its place a base copy of another card of the same color randomly chosen from both players’ cards (all locations, excluding Johnny). Banish when moved to the graveyard.
name: Johnny

flavor: Some call her the "Iron Maiden."
info: No ability.
name: Jutta an Dimun

flavor: Forward, you sorry sods! Forward or you'll see the Nilfgaardians are the least of your worries!
info: Convert a Gold unit to Silver (or Bronze, if that was its original color).
name: Kaedweni Sergeant

flavor: I never miss twice.
info: Add 3 strength to each non-Gold Machine played on your side.
name: Kaedweni Siege Expert

flavor: "You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees." "Do what by the what now?"
info: Add 3 strength to 2 non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
name: Kaedweni Siege Support

flavor: When the time comes, the cockerel Kambi shall crow and awaken Hemdall.
info: After 3 turns, spawn Hemdall on this unit’s side. Destroy Kambi whenever Hemdall appears on the same side.
name: Kambi

flavor: Drinking the blood of the continent since the Conjunction.
info: Banish a non-gold unit in either graveyard and absorb its strength.
name: Katakan

flavor: How to kill a kayran? Simple! Take your best sword... then sell it, and hire a witcher.
info: Destroy 3 non-Gold units on your side and absorb their strength as base. When removed, set base strength to 8 (even when Locked).
name: Kayran

flavor: If I'm to die today, i wish to look smashing for the occasion.
info: Set the strength of the unit on the right (if non-Gold) to that of the unit on the left (if non-Gold).
name: Keira Metz

flavor: No one can replace Bran. Though they're sure to try.
info: Discard up to 3 cards from your deck. Shuffle your deck.
name: King Bran

flavor: I might just discover I look great without ears... or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.
info: Play the weakest non-Gold unit from your deck. Ties are resolved randomly.
name: King of Beggars

flavor: A sight more horrid you've never seen… The poor soul lay shredded as the beast lapped up its blood from the ground all around.
info: Remove 3 strength from all non-Gold units on a row.
name: Lacerate

flavor: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.
info: Play Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
name: Lambert

flavor: Witchers never die in their beds.
info: Banish non-Gold units within 2 spaces and add their strength to this unit’s base strength. When removed, set base strength to 1 (even when Locked).
name: Letho of Gulet

flavor: Escape them? In the waters of Skellige? Good luck.
info: Gain Weather Immunity.
name: Light Longship

flavor: WAAAAAAAAAAGH!!!!
info: After 2 turns, gain 1 base strength for each unit in your graveyard. When removed, set base strength to 4 (even when Locked).
name: Madman Lugos

flavor: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle – we slash straight at their knees!
info: Gain Resilience. A Resilient unit stays on the battlefield for the next round.
name: Mahakam Defender

flavor: Only one punishment for disturbin' the peace in Mahakam: a hammer to the heid.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Add 3 strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield. If it’s a Dwarf, add 5 strength instead.
name: Mahakam Guard

flavor: I have you, dh'oine. You are all the same.
info: Remove 1 strength from a random opposing non-gold unit whenever a non-Ambush Elf unit appears on your side.
name: Malena

flavor: This model specializes in slinging corpses and ripe dung.
info: Remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a card in either hand is revealed.
name: Mangonel

flavor: We know little about what manticores look like: though many have seen them, very few have lived to tell their tale.
info: No ability.
name: Manticore

flavor: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.
info: Choose 3 adjacent units. Remove 4 strength from non-Gold units among them.
name: Manticore Venom

flavor: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same...
info: Spawn either a Mutagen or a Spores effect.
name: Mardroeme

flavor: I care only about what's good for Aretuza and my pupils.
info: Spawn an Aretuza Adept whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
name: Margarita Laux–Antille

flavor: I'll take an attentive reconnaissance unit over a fine brigade any day.
info: Destroy all opposing Spying non-Gold units on the battlefield.
name: Menno Coehoorn

flavor: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. "Oh my," gasped Yennefer. "We're about to make quite the mess, I think."
info: Spawn a Biting Frost or Torrential Rain card, then banish self.
name: Merigold’s Hailstorm

flavor: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.
info: Return the strongest non-Gold, non Relentless unit (except self) on each side to your hand. Your opponent does the same if they have not yet passed. Ties are resolved randomly.
name: Milva

flavor: Damn, the filth's o'errun us… We need a witcher or there's no livin' 'ere!
info: Spawn 3 base copies of a Breedable unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Monster Nest

flavor: Lady Eithné's daughter had inherited her sublime beauty and her wild hatred for all that is human.
info: Destroy an unrevealed Ambush card, then gain 4 strength.
name: Morenn

flavor: The vilest man Skellige's ever known.
info: When moved to the graveyard, lose 2 base strength and resurrect.
name: Morkvarg

flavor: The summer sun reflected in the quiet waters of the Alba -- that's Nilfgaard to me.
info: Look at the top 3 cards in your deck and play 1.
name: Morvran Voorhis

flavor: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.
info: Remove 2 strength from a non-Gold unit, then 2 from a non-Gold unit, then 1 from a non-Gold unit.
name: Myrgtabrakke

flavor: You exact from the earth a blood ransom, ripping out its riches by force. To us it bloomed, bore fruit and gave freely, for it loved us as we loved it.
info: Spawn a base copy of the last non-Gold Special Card played, then banish self.
name: Nature’s Gift

flavor: They call us Death's heads. Care to find out why?
info: Remove 5 strength from a Spying non-Gold unit on either side of the battlefield. If the unit was destroyed, gain 4 base strength.
name: Nauzicaa Brigade

flavor: The Emperor will teach the North discipline.
info: Add 3 strength to adjacent non-Gold units.
name: Nauzicaa Standard Bearer

flavor: These little guys are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.
info: While in your hand, deck or on the battlefield, gain 1 strength whenever a Devourer unit on your side absorbs strength. When removed from the battlefield, play a Nekker from your deck.
name: Nekker

flavor: Take heed, gents, there's nekkers under this here bridge.
info: Create on the bottom of your deck 2 base copies of a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield.
name: Nekker Warrior

flavor: Few know more about healing than Nenneke.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit.
name: Nenneke

flavor: Sons of noble houses, born in the City of the Golden Towers, from the elite backbone of the Imperial Army.
info: Reveal a random card in your hand.
name: Nilfgaardian Knight

flavor: Each Wild Hunt warrior has gone through a rigorous selection process, but Eredin's personal cavalcade includes only the most brutal and most ferocious of the Aen Elle.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a Wild Hunt unit appears on your side.
name: Nithral

flavor: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.
info: After 4 turns, remove 1 strength from all opposing non-Gold units. Then return this Ocvist to your hand, set its base strength to 6 and remove its ability.
name: Ocvist

flavor: Drinkin' without Odrin is like rowin' without a paddle.
info: Every turn, move to a random row on the same side and add 1 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
name: Odrin

flavor: Do not disturb.
info: Add 1 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row. Whenever there are 3 or more units on the opposite row at the end of a turn, transform into Old Speartip: Awake.
name: Old Speartip: Asleep

flavor: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.
info: Resurrect at the start of the round and remove 2 base strength.
name: Olgierd

flavor: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.
info: Choose a non-Gold unit in your hand (other than the Operator). Create an exact copy in both players’ hands. Banish when moved to the graveyard.
name: Operator

flavor: They said the queen was prone to outbursts, but I did not expect that…
info: Destroy the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.
name: Pavetta

flavor: These are not the hands of an "Excellency," but of a farmer. So we speak peasant to peasant.
info: Reset a non-Gold unit to base strength.
name: Peter Saar Gwynleve

flavor: Soon the power of kings will wither, and the Lodge shall seize its rightful place.
info: You may play a Special Card from your hand. if you do, draw a card afterward.
name: Philippa Eilhart

flavor: I's a war veteran! Spare me a crown?
info: Spawn 2 base copies of this unit on the same row.
name: Poor Infantry

flavor: Modron Freya, the Great Mother, is the goddess of love, beauty and bounty.
info: Resurrect a Bronze non-Permadeath unit.
name: Priestess of Freya

flavor: He wears armor made of gold. Of course he's a jerk.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Draw 1 card face up and 1 card face down. Keep 1 and randomly place the other in your deck.
name: Prince Stennis

flavor: Picture Dandelion in a dress and you've got the general idea.
info: Draw 1 non-Gold card face up and 1 non-Gold card face down. Play 1 and randomly place the other in your deck.
name: Priscilla

flavor: Mooooooo.
info: When removed from the battlfield, spawn a Chort on the row where this unit was.
name: Prize Winning Cow

flavor: Not wealth or fame but intentions true -- that's what makes a hero of you!
info: Choose 3 adjacent units on your side. Convert all non-Gold units among them to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
name: Promote

flavor: The queen is guarded by the hardiest and fiercest shieldmaidens Skellige's ever known.
info: Resurrect all Queensguards and add 1 base strength to your Cerys unit, wherever it is.
name: Queensguard

flavor: The witcher raised a hand and quickly traced a path with it in the air. The crowd's rumble rose, the stones flew thicker. Yet the Sign curved their course, pushing them aside. They simply passed their target, protected by a shield unseen.
info: Choose a non-Gold unit in your hand. Give all instances of it in your hand and deck a Shield. Shields protect from one strength-removing effect (but not from strength-resetting or swapping effects).
name: Quen Sign

flavor: A king should be merciless towards his enemies and generous to his friends.
info: Choose 3 adjacent units. Lock all non-Gold units among them and remove 2 base strength from the locked units.
name: Radovid

flavor: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.
info: Remove 2 base strength from 8 random opposing non-Gold units on the battlefield.
name: Ragh Nar Roog

flavor: In their ballads skalds claim you cannot tell a berserker changed in the heat of battle from a true–born bear.
info: Transform into a Raging Bear if weakened but not destroyed.
name: Raging Berserker

flavor: See this here tattoo? 'At's me, hackin' at a dragon. A DRAGON, m'lady.
info: After 2 turns, play a Reaver Hunter from your deck.
name: Reaver Hunter

flavor: Haven't had much luck with monsters of late, so we enlisted.
info: Choose a Bronze unit (other than a Reaver Scout) on your side of the battlefield. Play an instance of it from your deck.
name: Reaver Scout

flavor: I'll die for Redania, I'll kill for Redania… I'll even eat worms for Redania!
info: If 3 or more Redanian Elites are on your side of the battlefield, convert them to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
name: Redanian Elite

flavor: For flory! For Radovid!
info: No ability.
name: Redanian Knight

flavor: Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood–drinking freak.
info: When removed from the battlefield, transform into Regis: Higher Vampire and play.
name: Regis

flavor: Never manages to hit the same place twice, which, upon further reflection, might constitute a real problem.
info: Remove 1 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
name: Reinforced Ballista

flavor: The latest rage in assaults on walled cities.
info: Gain 2 strength whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
name: Reinforced Siege Tower

flavor: Feel that? The earth trembles each time Big Bertha looses a stone.
info: Every turn, remove 1 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Reinforced Trebuchet

flavor: Sound the retreat! Regroup! And wait for reinforccements!
info: Choose a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield and play all instances of it from your deck.
name: Reinforcement

flavor: Medicus curat, magicae sanat.
info: Resurrect a Gold non-Permadeath unit.
name: Renew

flavor: Those cursed sorcresses are stealing our thunder! Whyever should folk choose a procedure taking several hours, when some perfumed tart can solve their problem with a wave of her hand?
info: Add 2 to the base strength of a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit in your graveyard, then resurrect it.
name: Restoration

flavor: Geralt, we gotta have a man-to-horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.
info: Play on a random row from your deck or graveyard whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
name: Roach

flavor: Let historians debate whether spreading plague in a besieged city is ethical. We just care if it's effective.
info: Spawn a Cow Carcass on an opposing row.
name: Rot Tosser

flavor: The Daughter of the Kaedweni Wilderness.
info: When destroyed, remove 3 strength from all non-Gold units on its side.
name: Sabrina Glevissig

flavor: Little Sarah wants to play!
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Gain 3 strength each time a Weather effect appears.
name: Sarah

flavor: I care not for kings and their titles. In the east lives one who truly deserves a crown.
info: Remove 1 strength from all opposing non-Gold units. Add 1 strength to all non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield (except self).
name: Saskia

flavor: "Tame"? Och, lad, Skelligers might train bears, but that don't at all mean they tame 'em…
info: Remove 1 strength from each non-Gold unit played on the battlefield. Does not affect spawned units.
name: Savage Bear

flavor: Time to look death in the face.
info: Ambush: When the next non-Gold Special Card is played, cancel its effects, then destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s).
name: Schirru

flavor: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.
info: Destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.
name: Scorch

flavor: We do what we must. I am not ashamed of that.
info: Choose an opposing non-Gold unit and remove 1 from its strength for each revealed card in both players’ hands.
name: Serrit

flavor: I'm a medic. I tend to know what I'm doing when I prescribe something.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit and convert it to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
name: Shani

flavor: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!
info: No ability.
name: Sheldon Skaggs

flavor: Fall on your knees and beg Modron Freya for forgiveness.
info: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit. Gain 1 strength whenever a unit is played on your side from either graveyard.
name: Sigrdrifa

flavor: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.
info: Remove 4 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
name: Sile de Tansarville

flavor: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.
info: Spawn an Impenetrable Fog or Torrential Rain card, then banish self.
name: Skellige Storm

flavor: Strike his name from the Saga of Elders! No one dare grant him shelter or sustenance!
info: Lose 2 strength at the start of your turn. When removed from the battlefield, spawn Craven Revived on the same row.
name: Skjall

flavor: The North has nothing with which it could surprise us.
info: While in your hand, deck or on the battlefield, gain 1 strength whenever a card in either player’s hand is revealed.
name: Spotter

flavor: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.
info: Remove 2 strength from 6 random opposing non-Gold units.
name: Stammelford’s Tremors

flavor: My mark scars the face of our future empress. That is my proudest achievement.
info: Choose any card in your deck, then shuffle your deck and place the chosen card on top.
name: Stefan Skellen

flavor: Why fight? There are much better ways to work off excess energy...
info: After 2 turns, move the strongest other non-Gold unit on the row to the other side (ties are resolved randomly).
name: Succubus

flavor: The emperor also thought him an accidental king. At first.
info: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card.
name: Svanrige

flavor: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.
info: Add 8 strength to a non-Gold unit.
name: Swallow Potion

flavor: And hands off the girl! Whatever we may be, we're not savages.
info: Move all instances of an opposing non-Gold unit from your opponent’s deck to their graveyard.
name: Sweers

flavor: Temeria! Temeria! Gods shed all grace on thee! And smite thy foes with horrid woes, for all eternity!
info: Play all Temerian Foot Soldiers from your deck.
name: Temerian Foot Soldier

flavor: Piss off! We aren't all philanderers. Some of us have depth…
info: Redraw up to 1 card.
name: Thaler

flavor: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.
info: Draw 2 cards. Discard 2 cards.
name: The Last Wish

flavor: The witcher's face changed… His mien turning inhuman, horrifying.
info: Choose 3 adjacent units. Add 4 strength to all non-Gold units among them.
name: Thunderbolt Potion

flavor: Tibor's zeal was legendary. It was said when the emperor passed, he'd not so much bow as somersault.
info: If your opponent has not passed, gain 15 strength, then your opponent draws the top Bronze card from their deck and reveals it. When removed, set base strength to 7 (even when Locked).
name: Tibor Eggebracht

flavor: Even the rain in this land smells vile.
info: Spawn a Rain effect on both Siege rows that that decreases the strength of all non-immune units on or appearing there to 1. Units regain all strength removed by Rain when Rain is removed or they move out of it.
name: Torrential Rain

flavor: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes… But you reek, human.
info: Ambush: When the opposing player passes, add 2 strength to all non-Gold units within 2 spaces.
name: Toruviel

flavor: Many believe the empire's power rests upon the shoulder of its disciplined army and dutiful mages. In truth, the Nilfgaardian floren rules the world.
info: Move an opposing Spying non-Gold unit to your side and add 8 to its strength.
name: Treason

flavor: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!
info: Remove 2 strength from 2 opposing non-Gold units.
name: Trebuchet

flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.
info: Remove 4 strength from a non-Gold unit.
name: Triss Merigold

flavor: Cap'n... our arrows, they've... they've got wings!
info: Add 2 to all non-Gold units in your hand.
name: Triss: Butterfly Spell

flavor: Join me King Ravodid army. Order got - guard boatses.
info: Remove 1 strength from all non-Gold units on the opposite row. Gain 2 strength for each.
name: Trololo

flavor: The gods have spoken: a sacrifice is required.
info: Resurrect a random non-Gold, non-Permadeath card from the opposing graveyard.
name: Udalryk

flavor: For a fire mage, he's not very... flamboyant.
info: While in your hand, deck or on the battlefield, gain 1 strength whenever a card in either player’s hand is revealed.
name: Vanhemar

flavor: There's never been a problem a well-planed assassination couldn't solve.
info: Reveal up to 2 cards in your hand. For each card thus revealed, reveal 1 random card in your opponent’s hand.
name: Vattier De Rideaux

flavor: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.
info: Remove 5 strength from a non-Gold unit on the battlefield.
name: Vernon Roche

flavor: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.
info: Play a Blue Stripes Commando from your deck whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
name: Ves

flavor: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.
info: Play Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
name: Vesemir

flavor: The world has known as many plagues as it has wars. yet both war and plague always take men by surprise.
info: Resurrect a Bronze non-Permadeath unit from the opposing graveyard.
name: Vicovaro Medic

flavor: We are all pawns on his board. Playing a game whose rules we do not know.
info: Destroy a non-Gold unit. If it was on the opposing side, your opponent draws a card and reveals it. If it was on your side, draw and play a card. If your opponent has passed, you may only target a unit on your side.
name: Vilgefortz

flavor: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.
info: After 3 turns, destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) twice in a row.
name: Villentretenmerth

flavor: They sat still on their horses, seemingly relaxed. He saw their weapons – short spears with wide tips. Swords with oddly forged guards. Battle axes. Toothed gisarmes.
info: Every 2 turns, at the end of the turn, destroy the unit on the right (if non-Gold) and absorb its strength.
name: Vran Warrior

flavor: "Vrihedd? What's that mean?" "Trouble."
info: No ability.
name: Vrihedd Brigade

flavor: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.
info: Add 4 strength to a non-Gold unit in your hand.
name: Vrihedd Dragoon

flavor: ”Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.
info: Add 2 strength to the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on your side of the battlefield (except self), remove 1 strength from the weakest opposing non-Gold unit(s).
name: Vrihedd Officer

flavor: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.
info: Ambush: After 2 turns, reveal.
name: Vrihedd Sappers

flavor: Temerians, Redanians, all the same. Better off dead.
info: Spawn a Commando Neophyte on a random row.
name: Vrihedd Vanguard

flavor: They say Hemdall's heart swells whenever the longships sail out on a raid.
info: Remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever whenever you discard a unit.
name: War Longship

flavor: Some fight for Temeria. Other fight for Nilfgaard. I fight for the Heron.
info: Double the strength of all weakened non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
name: Warcry

flavor: Seen a lot o' ugly critters in me life – morays, lampreys, blobfish… But never nothin' like this!
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Spawn a Rain effect.
name: Water Hag

flavor: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.
info: Spawn a Biting Frost or Impenetrable Fog card, then banish self.
name: White Frost

flavor: Merely mention this name to a Nilfgaardian, and they'll feel a spreading warmth in their knickers.
info: Remove 3 strength from a non-Gold unit, then 2 from a non-Gold unit, then 1 from a non-Gold unit.
name: Wild Boar of the Sea

flavor: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Play all Wild Hunt Riders from your deck.
name: Wild Hunt Rider

flavor: The White Frost is coming.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Remove 1 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit and gain 2 strength if that unit is destroyed.
name: Wild Hunt Warrior

flavor: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village'll starve.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Spawn 3 Rabid Wolves and a Fog effect on your side only.
name: Woodland Spirit

flavor: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.
info: Remove 3 strength from an opposing unit non-Gold unit.
name: Wyvern

flavor: Astrology, hydromancy, haruspicy, ceromancy. Ovomancy, spodomancy, metroscopy, brontoscopy...
info: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent’s deck. You may move 1 to the bottom of that deck.
name: Xarthisius

flavor: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.
info: Gain Weather Immunity. Remove 1 strength from all other non-Gold units on the row. Draw a card.
name: Yaevinn

flavor: Ever hear o' the dragon Ocvist? From Quartz Mountain? Well, Yarpen Zigrin and his band o' dwarves did 'im in.
info: Gain Resilience. A Resilient unit stays on the battlefield for the next round.
name: Yarpen Zigrin

flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.
info: Spawn either a Unicorn or a Chironex.
name: Yennefer

flavor: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice... and when to conjure fire.
info: At the start of your turn, remove 1 strength from the strongest opposing non-Gold unit(s).
name: Yennefer: The Conjurer

flavor: Drinkin' alone's like crappin' with company.
info: Gain Resilience. A Resilient unit stays on the battlefield for the next round.
name: Zoltan Chivay

flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.
info: Spawn one of the two Field Marshal Duda units.
name: Zoltan: Animal Tamer
